data.title: Worldwide distribution
data.meta_description: International distribution of mother tongue Estonian including regional allocations. Mainly in in Estonia.
data.text:
Estonian speaking countries

As Estonia's only official language, Estonian is spoken by over one million people, 936,000 of whom are native speakers.

The language is not widely spoken outside the country. A few small Estonian communities can be found on the Ã…land Islands, in neighboring Latvia and Russia.

The total number of native speakers worldwide is estimated at 1.2 million.
